page.title: 12WEARDALE FESTIVAL OF MUSIC
page.content:
The Music Festival is in June every year. It is a competition for all age groups. It is held in St.Johns.Chapel Town hall and the Methodist Chapel. People come from outside Weardale to play in it, sometimes as far away as Newcastle.
In the Festival competitors play different instruments eg.flute, piano, brass, violin. They also sing solos and duets of classical songs. There are sections for different ages but all competitors in each section perform the same pieces. For the prizes in each group the winner gets a Trophy and everybody gets a certificate .
The adjudicator was Mr.Derrick Cantrell he is a famous organist in a Cathedral.
